dict.string: The provided proxy could not be contacted. If you are in the UK the proxy in preferences should be set to none. If you are in fact outside the country, please report the failed proxy using the menu item located in the application menu.

The proxy you specified could not be contacted. If you are in the UK the proxy in preferences should be set to none. If you are outside the UK, please either specify a new proxy of your own or use the one that is provided.
The ITV site could not be contacted. Please check your internet connection.
None of the download formats you specified were available for this show. Please add more download formats to your list in preferences.

The download of the show could not be resumed. Please either delete or rename the partial file left behind in your download folder. The downloaded portion will be playable with Adobe Media Player or similar.
The show could not be located on iPlayer/ITV Player. If outside the UK, use a proxy.
This programme has already been downloaded and is in the history. To re-download it, go to File->Edit Download History, remove it, and try again.
This show already exists in the download directory. If you would like to download it again, delete the file first.
Broadcaster thinks you are outside the UK. Please enable the provided proxy option in preferences.
GiA could not process this programme. Please submit a bug report.
GiA does not support downloading HTTP Dynamic Streaming programmes from 4oD. Unfortunately, this show is one of them.
GiA did not find a suitable download format for the 4oD programme.
Many 4oD programmes are unavailable to GiA. Unfortunately, this programme is one of them.
Please go to Preferences -> Other Formats and add at least one download format to the list.
None of the specified formats were available. Please go to Preferences -> Other Formats and add at least one download format to the list.
This show is only available in audiodescribed and/or signed modes. Please enable these modes in preferences if you would like to download this show.
